name: Problems of Projection, v.2
description: Further modifications for Jason Ginsburg's computer model for Chomsky 2013, 2015 PoP-model. Features are more complex: instead of rewriting and replacing features, Features can 'link' other features to value them. Also added feature family to distinguish e.g. Phi-features and generally feature types that are treated differently.
author: Jukka Purma
